sentences.en: 40 of the course participants are offered employment with the company.
sentences.cn: 参加课程学习的人中有40名得到了在该公司工作的机会。

sentences.en: A Certificate of Appreciation will be awarded to each participant.
sentences.cn: 所有参赛者均会获赠嘉许状.

sentences.en: an active participant in the negotiations
An additional bonus of 2 WW will be awarded to each participant.
sentences.cn: 额外奖金2威望将颁发给每个参与者.

sentences.en: Every participant will be given a cap as souvenir.
sentences.cn: 各参加者均获赠大会纪念帽一份.

sentences.en: He has been an active participant in the discussion.
sentences.cn: 他一直积极参与这次讨论。

sentences.en: He is an active participant in the civil rights movement.
sentences.cn: 他是人权运动的积极参加者。

sentences.en: If you have time – please answer a comment of another participant.
sentences.cn: 如果你有时间-请答复另外一个参与者的评论。

sentences.en: It takes being an active participant in my life.
sentences.cn: 我必须在这场游戏人生中积极主动.

sentences.en: It takes being an active participant in your life.
sentences.cn: 你必须在这场游戏人生中积极主动.

sentences.en: Man himself is a participant in this environment.
sentences.cn: 人类本身是其环境的参与者.

sentences.en: Note: A Certificate of Attendance will be given to registered participant.
sentences.cn: 注: 已注册的参加者将获发听讲证书.

sentences.en: Participant sales meeting or training courses arranged by the company.
sentences.cn: 参加公司召开的销售会议或组织的培训.

sentences.en: Participant should put on standard lifejacket or buoyancy aid throughout the competition.
sentences.cn: 赛员必须在整个赛事穿著合标准之救生衣或助浮衣.

sentences.en: The engineer was an eager participant in technical co - operation.
sentences.cn: 那位工程师热心参与技术合作.

sentences.en: There is no comparison between the knowledge and skill of such a player and the ordinary casual participant.
sentences.cn: 临时的普通参赛者无法与这种选手所掌握的知识和技巧相提并论。

sentences.en: Within this ceremony, each participant is given two pieces of paper.
sentences.cn: 在这仪式内, 每个参与者被给予两张纸.

sentences.en: You are expected to be an active participant.
sentences.cn: 你应该成为积极的参与者。

words.tran_cn: 由多人一起参加的；（股票等）持有人有权分享利益的
供人分享的；吸引参与的

trans.tran_cn: 参加者，参与者，与会代表，参与国，关系者
trans.tran_en: someone who is taking part in an activity or event
